Articles.Content:
This is a thread designed for the community to shwocase their 1.25m space stations made with Sam Hall's 1.25m Hitchhiker, or any 1.25m space station with crew capacity.

Here is Mine: The Tuna Mk1

Javascript is disabled. View full album
Edited June 14, 2014 by mike9606

Nice Station,

If i was you i would add more modules to your stations (docking array, solar array,...)

If i would know how to share pictures then i would show some of my creations

bit of a nitpick, but since it appears to have no docking collars or ring, wouldn't this simply be an oversized satellite rather than a station? It's hard to tell, since many of your pictures are quite dark and taken at angles that you almost can't even see the thing.

Although on closer look, and much adjustment of my monitor gamma I think there just might be a tiny dock clamp on the top, or that could just be the top of the adaptor you have there. It's a nice design, just doesn't seem like a station if it can't have other pieces dock with it.
